subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: Rodriguez has enjoyed a bounce-back season after missing all of 2014 because of a drug suspension, and is on pace to join the rarefied club of 3,000 career hits by early summer.
snippet: Rodriguez has enjoyed a bounce-back season after missing all of 2014 because of a drug suspension, and is on pace to join the rarefied club of 3,000 career hits by early summer.
